data.name: Isles
data.detailed_description:
WISHLIST & FOLLOW FOR UPDATES!


Join our discord


About the Game



Island Construction


Through rational allocation of resources and clever use of square shape, build your own island world. When building buildings, we should consider the reasonable production and consumption of gold coins and raw materials, and take care of the feelings of the islanders. If they are not careful, they may slow down, but they can't slave them all the time.



Defend Your Home


When it develops to a certain extent, it will be remembered by others. To prevent deprivation, destruction and occupation, we need to build our own army and defensive buildings. The type and location of military and defense buildings should be reasonably selected. If there is a military layout thinking strategy, baojiawei island will be more effective with half the effort.



Ecosystem


Simulate a real cloud system, alternating seasons. Different seasons have different effects on survival, life and islanders. In autumn, enough food should be stored to ensure that the cold winter can be passed smoothly. At the same time, the output efficiency of forests will be higher in spring.

When building buildings, we should consider the reasonable production and consumption of gold coins and raw materials, and take care of the feelings of the islanders. When it develops to a certain extent, it will be remembered by others. To prevent deprivation, destruction and occupation, we need to build our own army and defensive buildings. The type and location of military and defense buildings should be reasonably selected. If there is a military layout thinking strategy, baojiawei island will be more effective with half the effort.

Simulate a real cloud system, alternating seasons. Different seasons have different effects on survival, life and islanders. In autumn, enough food should be stored to ensure that the cold winter can be passed smoothly. At the same time, the output efficiency of forests will be higher in spring.
data.short_description: 《Isles》 is a 3D pixel world construction and resource management simulation game: reasonable planning blocks, placing resources, assigning tasks, and regularly electing appropriate leaders to lead the islanders to better develop and organize the army to defend the island.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, 2.0GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 6400+, 2.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 260 256mb or ATI Radeon HD 5670 256mb or Intel HD Graphics 4600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista/7/8/8.1 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470, 2.7GHz or AMD FX-6300, 3.2Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, 1gb or AMD Radeon HD 7870, 1gb
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
